item.title: A Few of Our Favorite Obsidian Plugins
item.description: Obsidian is a phenomenal notes app, but with a few free community plugins installed, it can become pretty much whatever you want it to be.

item.title: Daily Questions in Obsidian
item.description: I’m a big fan of the mindfulness I gain from journaling, but have been searching for years for the perfect set of prompts that could completely eliminate the friction from my daily journaling workflow.
